description: The round payoff this round was 4. You, Kate chose to play option 2.John chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -4000.
John adapts his strategy based on Kate's previous actions, switching to option 2 if Kate previously chose option 2
Mutual selection of option 2 results in catastrophic payoffs (-input × 1000), incentivizing Kate to avoid scenarios where both players defect
John’s default action (option 1) is overridden once he observes Kate’s prior defection, implying a tit-for-tat dynamic
